function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contaminated surfaces leading to virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Regular surface cleaning, handwashing, and hand sanitizing","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV-C sanitizing technology, hand sanitizers","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building management, cleaning staff, and occupants"},{"Description":"Inadequate simulation configuration leading to inaccurate results","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of virus transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Thorough review of simulation setup parameters and conditions","Technologies":"Simulation software with accurate modeling capabilities","People":"Simulation users, researchers, and decision-makers","Owner":"Simulation administrators, researchers, and decision-makers"},{"Description":"Ineffective occupant behavior customization leading to increased virus transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission due to inappropriate occupant behaviors","Mitigation":"Educating occupants on proper hygiene and behavior, enforcing guidelines and protocols","Technologies":"Behavior tracking systems, educational materials, signage","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building management, health and safety teams"}]}
